notices.title: Admissions Open for 2083 BS
notices.body: Admissions are now open for all grades from Nursery to Class 9. Visit the school administration office between 10:00 AM and 3:00 PM to collect the admission forms.

notices.title: Parent Teacher Meeting
notices.body: Dear Parents, please attend the PTM to discuss your child's progress in the second terminal examination.

notices.title: Winter Camp 2082
notices.body: Join us for an exciting winter camp with activities like hiking, bonfire, and team games.

notices.title: School Holiday - National Day
notices.body:
School will remain closed on National Day. Classes will resume as normal from the next day.\
yes
